name: Stellar Harmony
description:
The earth is in ruins caused by climate change. seeking for a new, sustainable start we look to the stars.

It is your job to harvest sustainable energy from a nearby interstellar planet, but shortly after arriving and starting the project, trouble commences. Locals don’t want the building of machines near their residences. “Why?” appears to be a tough question as there is a heavy language barrier between you and the strange creatures.

On this strange planet it is your job to contact the creatures and formulate a plan to resolve the conflict and to complete the harvest of sustainable energy.
